title: NSF I-Corps Training Course for Early-Stage Startups
description:
Have a startup idea, or a new technology you're interested in commercializing? Bay Area NSF I-Corps can help you turn ideas into reality. This one-week course includes three evening sessions, based on Steve Blank's Lean LaunchPad (Business Model Canvas + Customer Discovery), on how to identify and refine value propositions and customer segments to de-risk your idea and achieve product-market fit. Outside of class, you'll conduct at least 15 interviews with potential customers. Teams that complete this course may qualify for the National I-Corps Program, a 7-week course that comes with a $50,000 NSF customer discovery grant.

When: Course sessions are held online July 19, July 21, July 26 from 6-9pm PST.

Who: Anyone with a technology-based startup ideaâ€‹ that originated at a university or academic lab

Application deadline: July 2, 2021

Learn more about NSF I-Corps and apply [here](https://bayicorps.com/).
